snippet: After becoming the first female rider to guide a horse to victory in the Kentucky Oaks in 2012, Rosie Napravnik matched the feat in a four-and-a-half-length victory Friday.
abstract: Jockey Rosie Napravnik and horse Untapable win Kentucky Oaks at Churchill Downs; Napravnik became first female jockey to win that race in 2012.
lead_paragraph: After becoming the first female rider to guide a horse to victory in the Kentucky Oaks in 2012, Rosie Napravnik matched the feat in a four-and-a-half-length victory Friday.

headline.main: Aboard Untapable, Jockey Napravnik Wins a Second Oaks
headline.print_headline: Aboard Untapable, Jockey Napravnik Wins a Second Oaks
